update t_address
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.insert: insert into t_address(uid, name, province_name, province_code, city_name, city_code, area_name, area_code, zip, address, phone, tel, tag, is_default, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) values(#{uid},#{name},#{provinceName},#{provinceCode},#{cityName} ,#{cityCode},#{areaName},#{areaCode},#{zip},#{address},#{phone},#{tel}, #{tag},#{isDefault},#{createdUser},#{createdTime},#{modifiedUser},#{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: select from t_address where uid=#{uid} order by is_default desc,created_time desc
mapper.update: update t_address set is_default='0' where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select from t_address where uid=#{uid} order by modified_time desc limit 0,1
